pkgmetadata.longdescription: The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from OpenJDK6 (http://openjdk.java.net) using Free Software build tools along with additional tools such as a browser plugin and Web Start support via NetX.

use.flag: Use the CACAO virtual machine instead of HotSpot on x86, amd64 or SPARC architectures.
Enable the zero assembler port of HotSpot.
